name: American Water - Digital Innovation Apps Showcase
description: Comprehensive digital transformation initiative delivering seven integrated applications for workforce management, customer engagement, operational analytics, and safety management across America's largest water utility company.
challenge: American Water faced multiple operational challenges including scattered customer data across various systems, legacy workforce management tools, limited real-time analytics for millions of meters and sensors, unreported safety incidents, and lack of unified employee and customer portals. These challenges led to operational inefficiencies, revenue loss, and compromised safety protocols.
solution: Delivered an integrated suite of seven innovative applications: Customer 360 for unified customer data management, Meter Analytics for predictive maintenance and anomaly detection, Workforce Management for optimized scheduling and routing, Workforce Safety for incident reporting and risk prediction, Customer Portal for self-service capabilities, Homeowner Services for warranty management, and an AI-powered Intranet for employee engagement across 6,700+ employees in 47 states.
outcomes: 360-degree customer view consolidating data from multiple systems
AI-driven predictive analytics preventing equipment failures and revenue loss
Optimized workforce routing with traffic, weather, and crime data correlation
Comprehensive safety incident tracking and real-time risk alerts
Enhanced customer self-service capabilities reducing support overhead
Streamlined homeowner warranty claims management with B2B integrations
Interactive employee intranet with voice-enabled conversational UI
Significant reduction in travel time and operational costs
Improved safety protocols with predictive risk analytics
Enhanced customer satisfaction through unified portal experience
